info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 5:33AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington and northeastern Rensselaer Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 532 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Cambridge, Lee, White Creek, Easton, Stillwater, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Schaghticoke Hill, Center White Creek, Hoosick Junction, West Cambridge, Post Corners, East Hoosick, Johnsonville, East Buskirk, Wayville, Eagle Bridge and Eagleville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
